text: Hildur Ingveldar Guðnadóttir (born 4 September 1982) is an Icelandic musician and composer. She is known for composing the soundtracks for the 2019 miniseries Chernobyl and the 2019 comic movie Joker. She won a Golden Globe Award from it. She has played and recorded with the bands Pan Sonic, Throbbing Gristle, Múm and Stórsveit Nix Noltes. She also toured with Animal Collective and Sunn O))). == References == Category:Golden Globe Award winning composers Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century composers Category:Cellists Category:Musicians from Reykjavík Category:Icelandic composers
title: Hildur Guðnadóttir
